title: Celestial Star Bangle Set - Nakshatra Kadiyam
materials: 22K Gold plating over alloy. Hand-selected Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones in D-color and VVS clarity. Durable
features: Elegant open-end bangle design featuring starburst settings with multi-faceted Cubic Zirconia stones. Delicate gold-plated filigree detailing accentuates the stones, providing a shimmering effect. The design showcases the stars - 'Nakshatra', which brings good fortune. The minimalist design allows for comfortable, daily wear and versatile styling.
colors: Predominantly gold with brilliant white sparkle from the Cubic Zirconia stones. The gold finish has a warm
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for birthdays and anniversaries. Can be paired with traditional Indian outfits or Western attire.
description: Modern design with a subtle traditional touch. The star motifs symbolize celestial blessings and good luck. Crafted with premium materials for long-lasting shine and durability. Comfortable to wear and easy to style. Hypoallergenic material ensures suitability for sensitive skin. A beautiful blend of Indian heritage and contemporary aesthetics.
